#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
ull gcd(ull a,ull b)
{
	while(a!=0)
	{
		ull x=b%a;
		b=a;
		a=x;
	}
	return b;
}
int main()
{
	ull hcf,n,m,nume,deno,t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		deno=n*m;
		if(n%2==0 && m%2==0)
		nume=(n/2)*(m/2)+(n/2)*(m/2);
		else if(n%2==0 && m%2==1)
		nume=(n/2)*(m/2+1)+(n/2)*(m/2);
		else if(n%2==1 && m%2==0)
		nume=(n/2+1)*(m/2)+(n/2)*(m/2);
		else
		nume=(n/2+1)*(m/2)+(n/2)*(m/2+1);
		hcf=gcd(nume,deno);
		cout<<nume/hcf<<"/"<<deno/hcf<<endl;
	}
}
